thread.section_title: The London NYC - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic gym!
thread.title_full: Fantastic gym! - Review of The London NYC, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: VivaciousVal
title: Fantastic gym!
text: This is one of my favorite places to stay in NYC. The rooms are large with a sitting area and desk to work. And the bathroom showers are large enough for 2 people! But best treat is their gym - with 5 elliptical, several treadmills, all the weight equipment you need and a kinesics system. And the hotel is quiet - great spot when in midtown.
